Items.Title: Oversight:  Evaluating the Board of Elections’ Performance in the 2011 Primary Election.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight:  Evaluating the Board of Elections’ Performance in the 2011 Primary Election.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the New York State Governor to sign into law legislation that would require that paper ballots be designed in a more user-friendly manner.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require that paper ballots be designed in a more user-friendly manner.

Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the New York State Governor to sign into law legislation that would require that paper ballots be designed in a more user-friendly manner.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the New York State Governor to sign into law legislation that would require that paper ballots be designed in a more user-friendly manner.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require that paper ballots be designed in a more user-friendly manner.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Fidler and Lander.
